name: Ernest ODGERS and Arnold Nayowith, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW. and Petition of the SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA

parties: Ernest ODGERS and Arnold Nayowith, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW. and Petition of the SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of April, 1986, the respondents’ motion to quash the notice of intervention filed on behalf of The School District of Philadelphia is granted. In addition, the petition for allowance of appeal of The School District of Philadelphia is also quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
508 A.2d 1197
Ernest ODGERS and Arnold Nayowith, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW. and Petition of the SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 4, 1986.
